== Setup Build Environment (java) ==
if haven't installed yet,<br>
	`sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /home/yliao/workspace/toolchains/marvell/bg2/jdk1.5.0_22/bin/java 300`<br>
	`sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javac javac /home/yliao/workspace/toolchains/marvell/bg2/jdk1.5.0_22/bin/javac 300`<br>
<br>
then, we can use these to change java version:<br>
	`sudo update-alternatives --config java`<br>
	`sudo update-alternatives --config javac`<br>
<br>
there will create a link like:<br>
	`/usr/bin/java -> /etc/alternatives/java /home/yliao/workspace/toolchains/marvell/bg2/jdk1.5.0_22/bin/java`<br>
OR<br>
	`/usr/bin/java -> /etc/alternatives/java/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/jre/bin/java`<br>
